definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: ornament, adornment, splendour, only cstr. [[מַלְכוּת]] ´[[ה]] Da 11:20 splendour of (the) kingdom, cf. AV RV, i.e. Judaea, or perh. Jerusalem acc. to Leng Hi Meinh ; but rather royal splendour, cf. Gr, & esp. Bev who reads ´[[נוֹגֵשׂ מַעֲבִיר ה]] (for HCT [[מעביר נוגשׂ]]), i.e. an exactor who shall cause the royal splendour to pass away.
